Detailed Description

Static mesh class.

This class implements the group of geometry faces that define a convex volume, i.e. a BSP leaf node. The only member of the class is a flyMesh object representing the mesh. The methods available include one for retrievieng the mesh, two for ray-intersection and one for receiving messages.
